description: unfinished painting by David leaning against the wall in a gallery; tan walls, wood floors in zigzag design; sawhorses stanchioning off painting on floor, LLC; pair of shoes at bottom center; pink sweater hanging over sawhorse at center; two wooden stepladders; white and green pail with red diamond-shaped label at right center on floor
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on back at bottom edge, in black ink: [Special Non-Edition Print for the collection of Mr. Drake of Minneapolis.]; on back at bottom center, in black ink: [RMG#Pd9904-022-c]
signed: on back at LRC, in black ink: [Polidori \'99]
title: Serment du Jeu de Paume Inachevée de David, L'attique Chimay, Chateau de Versailles
